decoworld.model.world.entities.pvp

Class PvpEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.StatEntity
        • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.CombatEntity
          • decoworld.model.world.entities.pvp.PvpEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasCombat, HasHealth, HasStats, StatListener, HasLevel, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public class PvpEntity
extends CombatEntity
    A basic entity class that extends CombatEntity and adds PvP support.
